sentences.sContent: The architect leaves washington with the democratic party resurge nt his own party reduced to an ageing and irascible core and the president with one of the lowest approval ratings in history.
sentences.sContent_eng: The architect leaves washington with the democratic party resurge nt his own party reduced to an ageing and irascible core and the president with one of the lowest approval ratings in history.
sentences.sCn: 当美国民主党复兴的时候，这位建筑师离开了白宫，把自己的党派弱化为一个年迈而易怒的核心，连总统的支持率也降到了最低。

remMethod.val: re(再) + surg(起来) → 再次站起来 → 复活

trans.tranOther: to rise again from or as if from the dead
